I tried to start a group called the "Malacons" that were an evil 
version of BM Maximals, but everyone hated me for it so I had to back 
down.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Guys, if you like, you can have chars in the Tripredacus. They are 
> techno-organics and "worship" the Matrix, but they are not related 
to 
> the don't-touch-the-planet philosophy of the BM Maximals. The games 
> start soon (finally!), and you want to be part of it!
